instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . Enter your email address or phone number. Enter your password. Tip : If you don't know your password, you can reset it at google.com/accounts/recovery. Tap Done .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Down arrow and then Manage accounts . Turn off the account you want to sign out of. Tap Done .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Down arrow and then Manage accounts . Under "Google+ pages," turn on the page you want to use and then Done .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Down arrow and then Manage accounts . At the bottom, tap Add account .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Down arrow and then Manage accounts . Swipe left on the account you want to remove.

Tap a text field, or a location in text you've already entered in a text field. Tap the Microphone key on the onscreen keyboard. When you see a microphone image appear on the screen, speak what you want to type. Be sure to speak all punctuation marks and say the following for each: Comma Period Question Mark Exclamation Point When you pause, what you previously spoke is transcribed by the speech-recognition software and entered in the text field, underlined. To remove the underlining, perform any of the following: Tap the Delete key. Resume speaking. Start typing.
